summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, transmitting a final version of a letter addressed to Judge Karas dated March 3, 2020. The email includes a question about a middle initial.

persons.name: Judge Karas
persons.context: The recipient of a letter being finalized by the email correspondents. The letter is dated March 3, 2020.

events.title: Letter to Judge Karas Finalized

keyFacts: A letter to Judge Karas was finalized on or around March 2, 2020.

The sender asks the recipient if they have a middle initial, suggesting the letter may require formal identification details.
